alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 10:06AM MST until December 27 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing Snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility in blowing snow reduced to as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Corson and Campbell Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST /11 AM MST/ today. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. The cold wind chills between 20 below and 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
